mapper.sql: CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, RID, CASE_RID, ACCESS_IP
CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, RID, CASE_RID, ACCESS_IP
mapper.select: select CASE_RID as RID from SMMS_WEB_CASE_IP where ACCESS_IP = #{IP}
select swc.rid as SWCRID, swc.WEBSITE_NAME as WEBSITE_NAME, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as SPONSER_CASE_NUM, swc.WEBSITE_URL as WEBSITE_URL from SMMS_WEB_CASE as swc where RID=#{RID}
select ACCESS_IP as access_ip from SMMS_WEB_CASE_IP where RECORDSTATE='0' and CASE_RID=#{CASE_RID}

select ssp.url, ssp.SNAPSHOP as snapshop, ssp.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as damage_class, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as case_id, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as rectify_term, ssp.CLOSE_TERM as close_term, ssp.rid as event_id,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as security_type
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as security_type
from smms_web_case as swc left JOIN
smms_pending_event as ssp on swc.rid=ssp.WEB_CASE_RID where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and RECORDSTATE='0' and swc.RID=#{CASE_RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_WEB_CASE_IP set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert: insert into SMMS_WEB_CASE_IP ( CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, RID, CASE_RID, ACCESS_IP) values ( #{CREATTIME}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE}, #{RID}, #{CASE_RID}, #{ACCESS_IP})
mapper.update: update SMMS_WEB_CASE_IP set RECORDSTATE='1' where CASE_RID=#{CASE_RID} and ACCESS_IP=#{ACCESS_IP} and RECORDSTATE='0'
